text: Brian Hall (1937-2010), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 3,000m Steeplechase and the 1 mile race at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He was a member of the Manchester & District Lads Club Harriers and later formed the Winsford Athletic Club. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2010 deaths Category:English male middle- distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Brian Hall (athlete)
